title: YARD / CUNO SPEED
description:
Cuno's speed quest.
* Futile
* Initiation
* Reporting

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Fucking right, pig. Cuno's filling..."
dialogueTree.text: "Fucking right, pig. Cuno's filling bath tubs with that shit. Cuno's a kingpin."

links.title: You: ""Can I have some? Just a little?""
links.text: "Can I have some? Just a little?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Did Cuno not tell you? Cuno doesn'..."
links.text: "Did Cuno not tell you? Cuno doesn't do that entrapment shit. King Pin Cuno ain't going to the pork pen. Get the fuck out of here!"

links.title: Half Light: "He's not worried about prison. He j..."
links.text: He's not worried about prison. He just wants to antagonize you.

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck no, pig. Cuno ain't dealing t..."
links.text: "Fuck no, pig. Cuno ain't dealing to the popo. Not doing the pork pen for your sad speed habit! You don't *know* Cuno."

links.title: You: ""You're yanking my chain, aren't yo..."
links.text: "You're yanking my chain, aren't you kid?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Don't be yankin' your shit in fron..."
links.text: "Don't be yankin' your shit in front of the Cuno. Cuno's always serious. Always rollin'. Big kilo, but you ain't gettin' any. Get the fuck off!"

links.title: Drama: "Belying the act, he's actually tell..."
links.text: Belying the act, he's actually telling the truth. Or at least 0.00001% of it. He has a *little* speed. He's just not giving it to you.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "He's GOT to at least know a source,..."
links.text: He's GOT to at least know a source, look at him! You need to figure this out somehow.

links.title: Suggestion: "You need to befriend him first."
links.text: You need to befriend him first.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Been waitin' for you to fucking ma..."
dialogueTree.text: "Been waitin' for you to fucking man up." He nods at the building behind him. "In there is Cuno's violent dad. On steroids. Cuno's dad does steroids *and* speed. If you can take him, you can have half the speed."

links.title: You: ""Who is your dad, Cuno?""
links.text: "Who is your dad, Cuno?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's dad is a fucking monster,"..."
links.text: "Cuno's dad is a fucking monster," he says proudly. "He's the most violent man in Revachol. He doesn't give a shit about a single thing. He drinks too."

links.title: Endurance: "Are you sure you can take the most..."
links.text: Are you sure you can take the most violent man in Revachol? In your condition?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Looks like we're looking at a close..."
links.text: Looks like we're looking at a close-quarters fight in some run-down drug den. Bongs falling, hookers screaming. You should use the environment against him.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You can't afford to take a hit from..."
links.text: You can't afford to take a hit from this guy. I mean, anabolic steroids... *and* speed. You're best off dodging blows, wearing him out until he has a heart attack.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You know how you'd be best off here..."
links.text: You know how you'd be best off here? With a gun. Best have it in your hand when you go in there.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Don't expect to talk this one down...."
links.text: Don't expect to talk this one down. There are some situations your mouth can't get you out of.

links.title: Suggestion: "You won't sweet-talk your way aroun..."
links.text: You won't sweet-talk your way around this man. Good thing this psycho drug-boss is strictly optional.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You know how you'd be best off here..."
links.text: You know how you'd be best off here? With a gun. I'd be the star of the show if you only had a working gun.

links.title: You: ""How much material are we talking a..."
links.text: "How much material are we talking about?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Like half." He says very confident..."
links.text: "Like half." He says very confidently.

links.title: You: ""Half of what?""
links.text: "Half of what?"

links.title: Cuno: ""A baggie... but like in this vial.""
links.text: "A baggie... but like in this vial."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "That's half a *gram*, sir."
links.text: That's half a *gram*, sir.

links.title: You: ""Half a gram?""
links.text: "Half a gram?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah." The confidence is unwaverin..."
links.text: "Yeah." The confidence is unwavering. "Half a G. Want it or not?"

links.title: You: ""But that's not very much material..."
links.text: "But that's not very much material at all."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck you talkin' about. Half a G?!..."
links.text: "Fuck you talkin' about. Half a G?! This shit is *giant*, grade A shit. So clean you can barely see it!"

links.title: Visual Calculus: "You can barely see it because there..."
links.text: You can barely see it because there's barely any.

links.title: You: ""I've made up my mind, Cuno. And th..."
links.text: "I've made up my mind, Cuno. And this is what's going to happen..." (Conclude.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Okay, Cuno's listening?""
links.text: "Okay, Cuno's listening?"

links.title: You: ""I'm going in there, all guns blazi..."
links.text: "I'm going in there, all guns blazing... to get that speed. Because I need it."

links.title: Cuno: ""Alright, pig... you can plug him,..."
links.text: "Alright, pig... you can plug him, but you can't stop him. It'll only buy you time."

links.title: Cuno: ""Just get in the apartment building..."
links.text: "Just get in the apartment building. Cuno knows you already fucked your way in. Cuno knows everything." He aggressively points at his eyes.

links.title: Cuno: ""Go to Room #12, first floor, and k..."
links.text: "Go to Room #12, first floor, and kick down the door. Police-violence-style. Cuno-style. And then it's action time: You're locked in the room with violent fuck head."

links.title: Cuno: ""That's it." He concludes. "Next ti..."
links.text: "That's it." He concludes. "Next time Cuno sees you, you better have his shit."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What the hell are you signing us u..."
links.text: "What the hell are you signing us up for here?"

links.title: You: ""I'm going to kill Cuno's dad.""
links.text: "I'm going to kill Cuno's dad."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Cool." He stares at you over his g..."
links.text: "Cool." He stares at you over his glasses. "No, no -- really. Rock and roll."

links.title: Conceptualization: "The lieutenant doesn't actually loo..."
links.text: The lieutenant doesn't actually look like a rock and roll enthusiast.

links.title: You: ""I'm a bad addict-cop. And I'm goin..."
links.text: "I'm a bad addict-cop. And I'm going to get my fix."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you know I don't like bad addi..."
links.text: "Did you know I don't like bad addict cops?" He stares at you over his glasses. "Almost no one in the RCM does."

links.title: You: ""C'mon, Kim..." (Whisper.) "Obvious..."
links.text: "C'mon, Kim..." (Whisper.) "Obviously I'm not gonna take it. We need to get drugs away from a minor."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay then," he concedes."
links.text: "Okay then," he concedes.

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's violent dad's got Cuno's ke..."
links.text: "Cuno's violent dad's got Cuno's key, so you need to fuck your way in there. Go to the pier-side. Bang on the door till the cleaning gimp lets you in. That's how Cuno does it."

links.title: Cuno: ""Then you go to Room #12 and kick d..."
links.text: "Then you go to Room #12 and kick down the door. Police-violence-style. That's what Cuno does. And then it's action time: You're locked in the room with violent fuck head."

links.title: You: ""I'm going in there, but not for th..."
links.text: "I'm going in there, but not for the speed. I'm going after the most violent man in Revachol."

links.title: Cuno: ""Sure, whatever. If you survive, ma..."
links.text: "Sure, whatever. If you survive, make sure to bring that shit back to Cuno. Cuno's almost out. You wouldn't like the Cuno when he's out."

links.title: You: ""I'm going in there for justice. I'..."
links.text: "I'm going in there for justice. I'm a narc, Cuno. I'm going to confiscate that crap."

links.title: Cuno: ""Sure." He winks at you. "Confiscat..."
links.text: "Sure." He winks at you. "Confiscate it. For Cuno. And you can have half."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "So half of a half is a quarter, rig..."
links.text: So half of a half is a quarter, right? We're probably talking about a quarter gram here.

links.title: You: ""I'm going in there for justice. I'..."
links.text: "I'm going in there for justice. I'm a narc, Cuno. I'm going to confiscate that crap." (Lie -- you need speed.)

links.title: You: ""I'm not going in there.""
links.text: "I'm not going in there."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno sees you're too pussy to face..."
links.text: "Cuno sees you're too pussy to face Cuno's dad. It's okay. Come back when your balls are big-time."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Another sane decision, detective.""
links.text: "Another sane decision, detective."

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""Cuno gets it from his dad. Cuno an..."
dialogueTree.text: "Cuno gets it from his dad. Cuno and his dad are major suppliers!" His eyes bulge; their veins reach out like tree branches. "That's where Cuno gets his lightning on."

links.title: Cuno: ""Problem is, Cuno and his dad had a..."
links.text: "Problem is, Cuno and his dad had a little falling out. Now junkies clawing at Cuno's door. Streets going mad. Cuno's gotta throw his dirty popo-man at it."

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "Okay, okay...""
links.text: (Nod.) "Okay, okay..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Dirty popo-man is you." He nods at..."
links.text: "Dirty popo-man is you." He nods at the building behind him. "In there is Cuno's violent dad. On steroids. Cuno's dad does steroids *and* speed. If you can take him, you can have half the speed."

links.title: You: ""Mhmh, this is very interesting, bu..."
links.text: "Mhmh, this is very interesting, but I'll have to get back to you."

links.title: Cuno: ""Don't take for fucking ever, Cuno'..."
links.text: "Don't take for fucking ever, Cuno's got wheels turning everywhere."

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""All right, now we talkin'. Same sh..."
dialogueTree.text: "All right, now we talkin'. Same shit as before. You give Cuno Cuno's kilo -- Cuno gives you half a kilo back."

links.title: You: ""Aren't you going ask how I got pas..."
links.text: "Aren't you going ask how I got past your dad?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Word on the street is you sent you..."
links.text: "Word on the street is you sent your little friend in dressed as a *hooker*. Distraction-style. That's some sick shit." He nods approvingly to the lieutenant.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Not a single muscle moves on the li..."
links.text: Not a single muscle moves on the lieutenant's face.

links.title: Cuno: ""Word on the street is you sent you..."
links.text: "Word on the street is you sent your little friend in dressed as a hooker. Distracted him. That's some sick shit. Tell your little slanty-eyed friend -- respect from the Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno wants to hear all about it, b..."
links.text: "Cuno wants to hear all about it, but first we split the kilo." He leans in. "Then we shoot the shit."

links.title: You: ""By kilo you mean gram, right?""
links.text: "By kilo you mean gram, right?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno knows what Cuno means.""
links.text: "Cuno knows what Cuno means."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Cuno means gram."
links.text: Cuno means gram.

links.title: You: ""All right. Fair is fair." (Give Cu..."
links.text: "All right. Fair is fair." (Give Cuno the vial.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Whooh that's heavy..." He waves th..."
links.text: "Whooh that's heavy..." He waves the minuscule bottle around, then slips it into his coat pocket.

links.title: Cuno: "Out comes another, similar vial --..."
links.text: Out comes another, similar vial -- from the sock above his running shoe. "Here you go -- *more* than half in there. Cuno's fuckin' honourable like that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "There is no movement on the lieuten..."
links.text: There is no movement on the lieutenant's face as he stares intently at the trash container.

links.title: Suggestion: "But he does *not* approve."
links.text: But he does *not* approve.

links.title: Cuno: ""Now tell me, how the fuck are you..."
links.text: "Now tell me, how the fuck are you still alive, pig?"

links.title: You: ""I looked around in there. It's not..."
links.text: "I looked around in there. It's not the easy life you've got going on in that apartment."

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck do you know about Cuno's..."
links.text: "The fuck do you know about Cuno's life? Cuno's got plans. Get the fuck out of here."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Yeah, we got plans.""
links.text: "Yeah, we got plans."

links.title: Shivers: "Six metres underground, below pipin..."
links.text: Six metres underground, below piping from before the war -- the collapsed remains of the Martinaise storm drain system. There are two stolen flashlights with piles of batteries next to them, beside two bedrolls. In the dark, an opening into the lower tunnels...

links.title: You: ""Cuno, I met your dad.""
links.text: "Cuno, I met your dad."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah -- you do some Sam Bo shit, s..."
links.text: "Yeah -- you do some Sam Bo shit, sneak in?" He looks at the lieutenant. "Is the hooker thing real?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Sam Bo is an acronym for Samaran bo..."
links.text: Sam Bo is an acronym for Samaran boxing. Graceful martial arts stuff. "Sam Bo style" implies stealth, cleverness, and cool. Just letting you know.

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, how are you still standing,..."
links.text: "Yeah, how are you still standing, pig? You sneak past him?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah -- how the fuck are you still..."
links.text: "Yeah -- how the fuck are you still *alive*, pig?"

links.title: You: ""It was dark in there. We sneaked i..."
links.text: "It was dark in there. We sneaked in and got out."

links.title: Cuno: ""You got lucky. Cuno's dad was out..."
links.text: "You got lucky. Cuno's dad was out getting more drink. Cuno knew that. That's why he sent you... Cuno cares about his pig. Doesn't want his pig to get *hurt*." He nods empathetically.

links.title: Cuno: ""You got lucky pig. Cuno's dad was..."
links.text: "You got lucky pig. Cuno's dad was out getting more drink. Cuno knew you'd have a window there. Now that Cuno thinks about it -- it was a mistake."

links.title: Cuno: ""Should've sent you in when he was..."
links.text: "Should've sent you in when he was there pushing 'roids in his ass. Thievin', double-crossin' liar-pig. Cuno got sentimental. That shit won't happen again."

links.title: You: ""It was what you said. Kim dressed..."
links.text: "It was what you said. Kim dressed up as a hooker, full drag. Distracted him."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant flashes you a sharp..."
links.text: The lieutenant flashes you a sharp look, but doesn't say anything.

links.title: Composure: "Only his tightly closed lips betray..."
links.text: Only his tightly closed lips betray the effort keeping silent takes him.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The next time you make statements l..."
links.text: The next time you make statements like this I suggest you first change into something a bit less *promiscuous* than those sleazy robes, officer.

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck outta here... Cuno made that..."
links.text: "Fuck outta here... Cuno made that shit up to *demean* you." He looks at the lieutenant, then the roaring dragon on your robes. Scratching the back of his head he says:

links.title: Cuno: ""Look, pigs. Cuno gets it. You don'..."
links.text: "Look, pigs. Cuno gets it. You don't wanna talk about it. Close-quarters combat shit, Cuno doesn't wanna talk about it either..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Combat trauma shit," he adds after..."
links.text: "Combat trauma shit," he adds after a few seconds of sombre silence.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Should we ever face a totally unrea..."
links.text: Should we ever face a totally unrealistic scenario like this, you would make a much more convincing hooker, *officer*.

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck outta here... Cuno made that..."
links.text: "Fuck outta here... Cuno made that shit up to *demean* you." His eyes move between you and the lieutenant.

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck outta here... Cuno made that..."
links.text: "Fuck outta here... Cuno made that shit up to *demean* you pigs, but..." He looks around. "Is that why your hooker-friend isn't here? Too ashamed to face the Cunn?"

links.title: Cuno: "He doesn't wait for your reply, but..."
links.text: He doesn't wait for your reply, but keeps going: "Look, Cuno's not judging. Cuno gets it. Tactical approach and shit. Hooker-style, covert ops, combat trauma shit. Whatever it takes, right?"

links.title: Pain Threshold: "That room was so small. To be stuck..."
links.text: That room was so small. To be stuck in there with him... not an easy fight for a kid.

links.title: You: ""Cuno, your dad is a half-dead alco..."
links.text: "Cuno, your dad is a half-dead alcoholic. He was sleeping under some clothes."

links.title: Cuno: ""What?!" His eyes become large and..."
links.text: "What?!" His eyes become large and round.

links.title: Composure: "His posture changes, the swaying ro..."
links.text: His posture changes, the swaying rooster motion stops for a second. Then he gets it going again. Reorienting himself.

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck right Cuno's dad was sleeping..."
links.text: "Fuck right Cuno's dad was sleeping like a bum," he snaps back. "Cuno told you -- Cuno's dad doesn't give a shit about *anything*. Fucking breaking-and-entering shit -- that's nothing to Cuno's dad."

links.title: Cuno: ""You got lucky, pig. Cuno knew this..."
links.text: "You got lucky, pig. Cuno knew this." He points to himself. "Cuno's fucking violent *fiend* dad's been drinking hard lately. Cuno knew you have a way in. Narrow window. Cuno window."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Cuno window?"
links.text: Cuno window?

links.title: You: ""'Cuno window'? C'mon kid. Just sto..."
links.text: "'Cuno window'? C'mon kid. Just stop."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck you tryin'a do... get the Cun..."
links.text: "Fuck you tryin'a do... get the Cuno to stop? Cuno's just getting it on!" His tone wavers.

links.title: Empathy: "A small lump forming in his throat."
links.text: A small lump forming in his throat.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Keep your ass together, Cuno...""
links.text: "Keep your ass together, Cuno..."

links.title: You: ""Stop acting tough, kid. You don't..."
links.text: "Stop acting tough, kid. You don't have to be scared of him anymore."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's not fuckin' trying to be to..."
links.text: "Cuno's not fuckin' trying to be tough!" He pushes on bravely. "This shit is real. Cuno's fucking violent dad's gonna be a vegetable -- Cuno knows that shit. Stroke shit, stomach fucked up, and..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's gonna go out like that too...."
links.text: "Cuno's gonna go out like that too. Gonna be just like Cuno's violent dad. Speed shit, crime shit, fucking on the bed -- go out West Revachol-style."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Stop saying all this *sad* shit, C..."
links.text: "Stop saying all this *sad* shit, Cuno." The whisper comes smaller than usual.

links.title: Empathy: "There is a touch of grief in there."
links.text: There is a touch of grief in there.

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck are you talking, *sad*?" The..."
links.text: "Fuck are you talking, *sad*?" The kid breathes in and out like a boxer. "Cuno's got hard shit." He punches the air. "Death shit. Nothing shit."

links.title: You: ""You don't have to turn into that.""
links.text: "You don't have to turn into that."

links.title: Cuno: ""Get your fucking nun ass out of he..."
links.text: "Get your fucking nun ass out of here before Cuno fucks it dead." He punches the air again. "F****t. You think 'cause you brought Cuno one gram of speed you're friends now?"

links.title: Cuno: ""'Turn into...'" He pants from exha..."
links.text: "'Turn into...'" He pants from exhaustion. "Cuno ain't turning into shit! Cuno *is*! CUNO *IS* THAT SHIT."

links.title: Endurance: "If he doesn't stop soon, he's going..."
links.text: If he doesn't stop soon, he's going to collapse from exhaustion. He's red all over.

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Cuno won... You *won*, Cuno!" The..."
links.text: "Cuno won... You *won*, Cuno!" The relief is palpable. The little hat jumps up and down behind the fence.

links.title: Volition: "He did not win. There is a crack in..."
links.text: He did not win. There is a crack in there now -- and it's spreading across the face of his certainty.

links.title: Cuno: "He punches the air again. "Get your..."
links.text: He punches the air again. "Get your fucking nun ass out of here before Cuno fucks it dead." Another punch. "F****t. You think 'cause you took Cuno's speed, Cuno's gonna sob like a f*g?"

links.title: You: ""Chances are you *are* going to tur..."
links.text: "Chances are you *are* going to turn into that."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck right I am." He punches the a..."
links.text: "Fuck right I am." He punches the air again. "Now get your nun ass out of here before Cuno fucks it dead." Another punch. "F****t. You think 'cause you brought Cuno one gram of speed you're friends now?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Turn into..." He pants from exhaus..."
links.text: "Turn into..." He pants from exhaustion. "Cuno ain't turning into shit! Cuno *is*! CUNO *IS* THAT SHIT."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck right I am." He punches the a..."
links.text: "Fuck right I am." He punches the air again: "Get your nun ass out of here before Cuno fucks it dead." Another punch. "F****t. You think coz you brought Cuno one gram of speed you're friends now?"

links.title: You: "Say nothing. (Change the subject.)"
links.text: Say nothing. (Change the subject.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuckin' tryin'a talk about Cuno's..."
links.text: "Fuckin' tryin'a talk about Cuno's dad then can't handle it. Typical f****t shit." His face is redder than usual and so are his earlobes.

links.title: You: ""Whatever scary thing he might have..."
links.text: "Whatever scary thing he might have been -- now he is nothing."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, Cuno's dad is fucking *nothi..."
links.text: "Yeah, Cuno's dad is fucking *nothing*!" He pushes on bravely. "Fucking coma shit. Stroke shit. Cuno's dad is so fucking violent he's had a stroke many times. Shit..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's gonna have one too. Gonna b..."
links.text: "Cuno's gonna have one too. Gonna be just like Cuno's dad. Speed shit, crime shit, fucking on the bed -- Cuno's gonna go out like Cuno's dad. Revachol West-style."

links.title: You: ""Yeah. I was wrong. He's hard core...."
links.text: "Yeah. I was wrong. He's hard core. A real killer."

links.title: Cuno: ""Stop trying to give Cuno your pity..."
links.text: "Stop trying to give Cuno your pity shit." He squints -- a pained expression. "Cuno knows what that shit is. Cuno's dad's gonna be a fucking vegetable. Stroke shit, stomach fucked up, and..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's gonna go out like that too...."
links.text: "Cuno's gonna go out like that too. Gonna be just like Cuno's violent dad. Fuck on speed, do crime shit -- go out fast, Revachol West-style."

links.title: You: ""I killed your dad, Cuno.""
links.text: "I killed your dad, Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""What is this shit? He's fucked up..."
links.text: "What is this shit? He's fucked up on 'roids to drink more, you can't kill him. Cuno's dad says he'll die by his *own* hand. Die suicide-style."

links.title: Endurance: "In his mind, his father isn't vulne..."
links.text: In his mind, his father isn't vulnerable the way other mortals are.

links.title: You: ""There was a textbook with your nam..."
links.text: "There was a textbook with your name on it in the apartment."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah?" He turns even redder. "So f..."
links.text: "Yeah?" He turns even redder. "So fucking what?"

links.title: You: ""It says *Kuuno* not Cuno. Kuuno de..."
links.text: "It says *Kuuno* not Cuno. Kuuno de Ruyter."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck are you talking to Cuno about..."
links.text: "Fuck are you talking to Cuno about that kiddy shit?"

links.title: You: ""That's a lame name, Cuno.""
links.text: "That's a lame name, Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno knows it's fucking lame. That..."
links.text: "Cuno knows it's fucking lame. That's why Cuno changed it."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""You can't fuck with Cuno!""
links.text: "You can't fuck with Cuno!"

links.title: You: ""I like it. Kuuno de Ruyter.""
links.text: "I like it. Kuuno de Ruyter."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""He's tryin'a fuck you again!""
links.text: "He's tryin'a fuck you again!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck outta here, Cuno knows it's f..."
links.text: "Fuck outta here, Cuno knows it's fucking lame. That's why Cuno changed it. Cuno can change his name into anything. Gonna change my name into f****t."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Don't change your name into that,..."
links.text: "Don't change your name into that, Cuno!"

links.title: You: ""Nothing.""
links.text: "Nothing."

links.title: Cuno: ""That's right. Fucking nothing.""
links.text: "That's right. Fucking nothing."

links.title: You: ""There were tons of unpaid utility..."
links.text: "There were tons of unpaid utility bills there."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck right there were. Fuckin' thr..."
links.text: "Fuck right there were. Fuckin' three years or some shit."

links.title: Rhetoric: "You can guess."
links.text: You can guess.

links.title: You: ""Let me guess. Cuno's dad doesn't g..."
links.text: "Let me guess. Cuno's dad doesn't give a shit about them."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, that's right." He swells wit..."
links.text: "Yeah, that's right." He swells with pride. "Cuno's dad doesn't give a shit about that electricity and light shit. Just wants to pound on people and drink."

links.title: You: ""That's no place to live in. You ha..."
links.text: "That's no place to live in. You have to find somewhere else."

links.title: Cuno: ""That's right, it's a shit hole. Cu..."
links.text: "That's right, it's a shit hole. Cuno's gonna move underground. Le Royaume shit, ancient shit. Cuno's gonna live in a fucking catacomb."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Yeah, in a tomb, Cuno!" The little..."
links.text: "Yeah, in a tomb, Cuno!" The little one seems overjoyed at the prospect.

links.title: You: ""Find a job. Pay them yourself. You..."
links.text: "Find a job. Pay them yourself. Your dad can't handle things anymore."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck that shit. Cuno's gonna move..."
links.text: "Fuck that shit. Cuno's gonna move underground. Le Royaume shit, ancient shit. Cuno's gonna live in a fucking catacomb."

links.title: You: ""Change of topic then.""
links.text: "Change of topic then."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's got that shit under control.""
links.text: "Cuno's got that shit under control."

links.title: You: ""I did right not to give you the dr..."
links.text: "I did right not to give you the drugs. Let's conclude this." (End the conversation.)

links.title: Cuno: ""That didn't change shit, pig. That..."
links.text: "That didn't change shit, pig. That only made things worse. Fucking social worker shit... It doesn't *work* pig."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""It doesn't work, Cuno! Only our sh..."
links.text: "It doesn't work, Cuno! Only our shit works."

links.title: Rhetoric: "She must repeat it. Use every chanc..."
links.text: She must repeat it. Use every chance to confirm that version of reality.

links.title: Empathy: "She tries to bind their fates toget..."
links.text: She tries to bind their fates together. She needs him. Bad.

links.title: You: ""I did right not to give you the dr..."
links.text: "I did right not to give you the drugs. Let's conclude this." (End the conversation.)

links.title: Cuno: ""That didn't change shit, pig. That..."
links.text: "That didn't change shit, pig. That only made things worse." He spits on the ground. "Cuno knows you only took 'em to get fucked up yourself. Pigs always be pretendin' about shit like that."

links.title: You: ""Okay. Let's conclude this business..."
links.text: "Okay. Let's conclude this business." (End the conversation.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, pig. This shit is done." He..."
links.text: "Yeah, pig. This shit is done." He spits on the ground. Yellowish, foaming spit. "Now get the fuck outta Cuno's face, Cuno needs to drop the bomb."

links.title: You: ""I'm keeping it. You don't need mor..."
links.text: "I'm keeping it. You don't need more drugs -- you're twelve." (Don't give it to Cuno.)

links.title: Cuno: ""All right..." He taps the side of..."
links.text: "All right..." He taps the side of his head. "Cuno knew you'd try that sneaky pig shit on him."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Tell him, Cuno!""
links.text: "Tell him, Cuno!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's got brains. This shit doesn..."
links.text: "Cuno's got brains. This shit doesn't surprise Cuno." He squints at you. "So Cuno's gonna give you one more chance. Know this, pig -- shit is *major*."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Major fucking choice, pig...""
links.text: "Major fucking choice, pig..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno won't take this shit lightly...."
links.text: "Cuno won't take this shit lightly. The pieces are moving, pig. This is fucking domino shit."

links.title: Logic: "It's hard to see how *not* giving t..."
links.text: It's hard to see how *not* giving the boy a bag of amphetamine would cause some catastrophic cascade response.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Hard to see, but easy to feel. Some..."
links.text: Hard to see, but easy to feel. Somehow this *will* change things.

links.title: Suggestion: "It's not hard to see at all. You ha..."
links.text: It's not hard to see at all. You hand out drugs to kids -- the lieutenant's faith in your judgement will diminish significantly.

links.title: Suggestion: "It's quite imaginable. You start ha..."
links.text: It's quite imaginable. You start handing drugs out to kids -- the lieutenant's faith in your judgement will diminish significantly.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Not like he thinks, but you can fee..."
links.text: Not like he thinks, but you can feel it. Somehow this *will* change things.

links.title: You: "What, if any, is the downside of *n..."
links.text: What, if any, is the downside of *not* giving the drugs to Cuno?

links.title: Suggestion: "None that you can see."
links.text: None that you can see.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "No. You *can* see it. This young ma..."
links.text: No. You *can* see it. This young man has junior officer material in him. In another life, where he trusts you.

links.title: You: "Forget it."
links.text: Forget it.

links.title: Cuno: ""Tik-tik-tik-tik." The boy flicks a..."
links.text: "Tik-tik-tik-tik." The boy flicks an imaginary domino piece with his index finger. "Decision time. What's it gonna be? You gonna fuck the Cuno?"

links.title: You: ""This is staying with me." (Don't g..."
links.text: "This is staying with me." (Don't give Cuno the vial.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Alright, alright..." He throws his..."
links.text: "Alright, alright..." He throws his hands up in the air. "You *fucked* the Cuno! Everybody, Cuno got fucked by his pocket pig -- just when we getting our business on, the pig throws it all away!"

links.title: Cunoesse: ""I told you he can't be trusted! I..."
links.text: "I told you he can't be trusted! I told you, I told you..." the little rat repeats it six or seven times. "I told you he'd steal the shit!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Relax C. We got plenty of kilo --..."
links.text: "Relax C. We got plenty of kilo -- kilo underground, in the tree, this ain't about that." He turns to you.

links.title: Cuno: ""This is about you and Cuno. You mi..."
links.text: "This is about you and Cuno. You mismanaged this shit. Now everything is *fucked* between us -- again. How are you gonna make this up to the Cuno, huh?"

links.title: Cuno: "He shakes his head in regret. "Cuno..."
links.text: He shakes his head in regret. "Cuno believes in second chances -- Cuno doesn't believe in third chances."

links.title: Cuno: ""This is about you and Cuno. You mi..."
links.text: "This is about you and Cuno. You mismanaged this shit. Now everything is *fucked* between us. How are you gonna make this up to the Cuno, huh?"

links.title: Drama: "There is genuine disappointment bel..."
links.text: There is genuine disappointment below the act, sire.

links.title: Empathy: "In truth, Cuno doesn't really belie..."
links.text: In truth, Cuno doesn't really believe there's anything you can do to make up for this. The damage is irreparable.

links.title: You: ""Okay, but just be smart about this..."
links.text: "Okay, but just be smart about this..." (Give Cuno the vial.)

links.title: Cuno: ""All right, now we're talking. Whoo..."
links.text: "All right, now we're talking. Whooh that's heavy..." He waves the minuscule bottle around, then slips it into his coat pocket.

links.title: You: ""I'm keeping it. And I'm doing it a..."
links.text: "I'm keeping it. And I'm doing it all myself." (Don't give it to Cuno.)

links.title: Cuno: ""All right, you fucking druggie..."..."
links.text: "All right, you fucking druggie..." He taps the side of his head. "Cuno knew you'd try that sneaky pig shit on him."

links.title: You: ""I already did it all, Cuno. Sorry.""
links.text: "I already did it all, Cuno. Sorry."

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck outta here, pig! You bett..."
links.text: "The fuck outta here, pig! You better have a baggie on you the next time Cuno sees you. You can't *advance* with the Cuno when you tryin'a play him like that."

links.title: Cunoesse: ""Speed fiend tryin'a play the Cuno.""
links.text: "Speed fiend tryin'a play the Cuno."

links.title: You: ""I'm not ready to make this decisio..."
links.text: "I'm not ready to make this decision."

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck are you talkin' about? Ge..."
links.text: "The fuck are you talkin' about? Gettin' Cuno all worked up for nothing..."

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: ""All right, so you got Cuno's kilo...."
dialogueTree.text: "All right, so you got Cuno's kilo." He rubs his hands together. "Here is how we do it. First, you give Cuno Cuno's kilo. Then Cuno gives you half back."

links.title: Cuno: ""That's how we split it -- it's the..."
links.text: "That's how we split it -- it's the *best* way. Street way."
